activities.title: Communications Officer
activities.description: Planned digital communications strategy for a successful crowdfunding appeal. Relaunched the visual identity for our student grant scheme. Increased compliance of web content with accessibility guidelines. Researched, wrote, and edited graduate stories.

activities.title: Development Coordinator, Supporter Engagement
activities.description: Managed a busy programme of direct mail fundraising appeals. Planned data segmentation and analysed results. Devised creative concepts, designed materials and wrote effective copy.

activities.title: Development Assistant (Research)
activities.description: Researched prospective donors, trusts and foundations in the UK and Asia.

activities.title: Novare Potential Academy
activities.description: Focus on frontend technologies, deepening knowledge of React, TypeScript, Sass, software engineering.

activities.title: Software Development Academy
activities.location: KTH Royal Institute of Technology in partnership with Novare Potential, Sweden (Remote)
activities.description: 15 weeks of intensive training covering object-oriented programming with Java, software engineering and web development.

activities.title: Master of Arts in French and German
activities.location: KTH Royal Institute of Technology in partnership with Novare Potential, Sweden
activities.description: First Class. Included exchange semesters at Freie Universität Berlin and L'Université de Franche-Comté.
